summary.title: Airspace monitoring threat model
summary.description:
The airspace monitoring system collects information from the OpenSky API to offer four services to user, through web APIs:
- a service to see which aircrafts are in the italian airspace at that moment
- a service to get information about a certain aircraft
- a service to continusly get the position of a certain aircraft
- a service to get information about the distance travelled and the CO2 emitted by aircrafts on the italian airspace in the last 1, 6 and 24 hours, plus the possibility to consult the history of this information for the last 30 days

threats.title: SQL Injection
threats.description: The web application requires the user to submit an icao24, that is then searched in the database. This opens the door to a possible SQL injection.
threats.mitigation: The submitted icao24 is checked for validity before constructing the SQL query.

threats.title: Generic DoS threat
threats.mitigation:
- Increment scalability, to support requests
- Filter requests, recognizing illegal/improper ones

threats.title: Generic DoS threat
threats.mitigation: Mitigation or prevention for the threat

threats.title: Generic threat to Integrity
threats.description: The data requested to the OpenSky APIs could be tampered with.
threats.mitigation: Find assurations the data is being received from the right source
